snippet.title: Super Mario Green Star Groove: Demo Version 2 - Release Trailer! (NSMBW Fan Mod) - 1.04
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD: https://www.mediafire.com/file/ltyz2pd8x9id8if/GSG_Demo_Version_2_1.04.zip/file

The demo has been updated to version 1.04, which adds a missing folder and some other files to prevent crashing, and smaller updates. Download that here if you've had any issues, just merge the folders with the ones on your SD card: https://www.mediafire.com/file/j985iimltf0sxdl/GSG_Demo_Version_2_1.04_Patch.zip/file.

Demo Version 2 Credits Video - https://youtu.be/XtPxGqWz3Vg

Super Mario Green Star Groove: Demo Version 2 is out now! Thank you all so much for the support you've given me. It means a lot, and I hope you enjoy the new demo! 💚

This demo includes 16 full custom levels, some updated from the original demo, and some all-new!

The demo includes a couple of extras as well, the Super Mario Odyssey Captain's Hat costume, and Super Mario Advance 2 Sunglasses Goombas! More extras, along with other options, are planned for the full mod.

Stay tuned for more updates!

This mod is a patch, designed to be played on real hardware with an official New Super Mario Bros. Wii disc, through use of Riivolution.

Horizon NSMBW Modding and Documentation Wiki - https://horizon.miraheze.org/wiki/Main_Page
Horizon Discord - https://discord.gg/XnQJnwa

Evolution Discord - https://discord.gg/aZAaXVJ
